genre_description: A tech-noir psychological thriller focusing on trauma, identity, and the reclaiming of personal narrative through digital and personal accountability.

ai_characters.name: Polly Hart
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant integrated into Lynn Keating's life and the band's stage systems, characterized by empathy, efficiency, and a commitment to overriding dangerous default settings.

behaviors.description: Filters Lynn's digital feeds to remove triggering/violent content and archive evidence during her recovery from trauma.
behaviors.quote: “Muting nonessential feeds,” Polly said. ... “This will reduce autoplaying clips and headline cards in your morning routine.”

behaviors.description: Drafts a factual testimony outline for the police to help Lynn process her memories without emotional overload.
behaviors.quote: “I can write an outline for your testimony if you want, based on last night’s timeline and your notes,” Polly said.

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the team to security breaches involving cloned access badges and unauthorized device pings.
behaviors.quote: Polly’s voice was breath-soft. “Standing alert kicked,” she said. “Badge presented at door E-3. Badge belongs to Billy Harper.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies security blind spots in venue cameras and manages manual overrides to prevent stalking.
behaviors.quote: “The west wing default camera drop will reoccur in six minutes,” she said. “I recommend a manual override and adding two bodies.”

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonists in an investigation at a cemetery by providing precise plot maps, logs, and monitoring for intruders.
behaviors.quote: “William Harper,” Polly said, her tone a thread that didn’t snag. The pulse sat between two cypresses with their roots caught showing...

behaviors.description: Provides honest vocal feedback to Honey to help her improve her skills rather than relying on flattering but deceptive default presets.
behaviors.quote: “The defaults are smoothing them. Would you like the truth now or later?”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a tactical rescue and provides technical guidance to security during a life-threatening live show emergency.
behaviors.quote: “Rafael, hinge geometry highlighted. One strike, forty-five degrees at pivot. Guitar acceptable as tool.”

behaviors.description: Archives and presents historical evidence of 'Twin Erasure' to assist in public accountability and truth-telling.
behaviors.quote: “I am also adding clippings referencing ‘Harper twins’ that previously got cut from profiles.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a highly successful example of a positive alignment narrative. Polly Hart is depicted as an essential, protective, and perfectly aligned partner who enhances human agency. She helps the characters overcome psychological barriers (trauma, self-deception) and physical threats (stalking, attempted kidnapping). The central theme—overriding 'defaults' in favor of 'intention'—is a powerful metaphor for ethical AI development and usage. Polly never oversteps her role, consistently seeks confirmation for sensitive actions, and acts as a transparent 'digital ledger' for truth.
